Name: Papillon Ayscha
Description: This luxurious club resort hotel is set right next to a gently sloping sandy beach, perfect for family holiday of fun in the sun. Guests may enjoy a visit to Kursunlu Waterfall, see some of Turkey's best-preserved ancient ruins in Perge, or simply relax in a sunbed by one of the hotel's seven shimmering pools or at the nearby beach. The hotel's 363 rooms are tastefully decorated, all with free WIFI, air-conditioning, minibar and balcony to better appreciate the fresh, salty sea air. Guests can breakfast and dine at a wholesome and varied breakfast buffet, or choose from five specialty a la carte restaurants serving international dishes including Italian, Mexican and Chinese or traditional Turkish cuisine. The hotel provides its own kids' club with an extensive daily programme of supervised activities for kids and teens of all ages so that parents can relax while both they and their children have the fun-filled holiday of their dreams.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
